name: Art Collector (Issacboy123)
description:
You are the art collector. Collect the portraits of art, but avoid the cans of soup and paint.

Created for the MS Paint Jam 2021.

Controls:
W or Up Arrow Key to jump.
A or Left Arrow Key to move left.
D or Right Arrow Key to move right.

Objective:
Avoid paint cans and cans of soup and get as many paintings as possible. 

Paintings:

Cans of Paint and Cans of soup:



Attributions:

Easy Lemon (30 second) by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3695-easy-lemon-30-second-
